snippet: Zhang Shuxia, an obstetrician in Shaanxi Province, received the death sentence but with two years’ reprieve for stealing seven babies and selling them.
abstract: Chinese court sentences obstetrician Zhang Shuxia to death but with two years' reprieve for stealing seven babies and selling them.
lead_paragraph: Zhang Shuxia, an obstetrician in Shaanxi Province, received the death sentence but with two years’ reprieve for stealing seven babies and selling them.

headline.main: China: Doctor Is Sentenced in a Case of Baby Trafficking
headline.print_headline: China: Doctor Is Sentenced in a Case of Baby Trafficking
